data.text: @agaetis_ Similarly the case for Fairbanks, AK, where I am from. It barely gets down to -40 these days. When I moved there, it did all the time for weeks on end.

@agaetis_ Sounds good. I had more in mind Interior BC when thinking about this, BUT Orikrindia is an island, so many Vancouver is a more accurate description. The north gets really cold in Orikrindia.

as well as masculine for all seasons. A lot of leather and fur for outdoors--especially during winter--Orikrindia's climate is like a cross between BC and Scotland, I think. Although rainier than BC, definitely. Hmmm... #worldbuilding
